short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily view the locations of your classes on UCSBMap.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your classes on UCSBMap.com with one easy click. UCSB Map for Gold adds a link to your schedule so you can easily see where your classes will be held.
